meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a maid.
meanings.sent1: Her maidish uniform was neat and tidy.
meanings.sent2: The apron gave her a maidish appearance.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her maidish outfit made her feel like a cleaning superhero.
meanings.sent4: The way she organized the room was so maidish, it was like magic.
meanings.sent5: The maidish look of her attire made her stand out among the crowd.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a manner considered typical of a maid.
meanings.sent1: She had a maidish way of tidying up the living room.
meanings.sent2: Her maidish demeanor was appreciated by the guests.
meanings.sent3: He playfully imitated her maidish actions while cleaning.
meanings.sent4: The precision with which she set the table was truly maidish.
meanings.sent5: Her maidish attention to detail made the house sparkle.
